name: celabyte-monorepo
description: AI Database Management Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:dashboard && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run lint || echo 'Server lint not configured'
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:server
scripts.test:client: cd client && npm run test || echo 'Client tests not configured'
scripts.test:dashboard: cd dashboard && npm run test || echo 'Dashboard tests not configured'
scripts.test:server: cd server && npm run test || echo 'Server tests not configured'
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development'

author: Rohnit Shriyan
